text: At that first Carnival in the world, when there were no more humans than the first couple, Adam wanted to dress up to make fun of Eve, and taking a puppet, he opened her two eye holes and turned her face. Then he wrapped his body in large tobacco leaves and then turned to Eve. And Eve, being a little astonished at the voice of the deceit which she had said to him, Who am I? she answered, Peter. FIN
title: Invención del Carnaval
author: Ramón Gómez de la Serna
